mapper.select: SELECT IMG_ID, IMG_LINK FROM TBL_IMAGE INNER JOIN TBL_MOVIE ON TBL_IMAGE.IMG_ID = TBL_MOVIE.MOVIEID WHERE TBL_IMAGE.IMG_ID = #{imgId}

SELECT TBL_IMAGE.IMG_ID, TBL_IMAGE.IMG_LINK, TBL_MOVIE.MOVIENAME, TBL_MOVIE.MOVIERATING FROM TBL_IMAGE INNER JOIN TBL_MOVIE ON TBL_IMAGE.IMG_ID = TBL_MOVIE.MOVIEID ORDER BY TBL_MOVIE.MOVIERATING DESC LIMIT 20
